sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165010 AA WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND YRS_MATE_CL_CD = #yrsMateClCd# /* 기타자료 */ AND CONB_CD = #conbCd# AND BSNO_ENC_CNTN = #bsnoEncCntn# AND RESNO_ENC_CNTN = ( SELECT RESN_REGN_NUM FROM PSNL0100 WHERE SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# )
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO YE165010 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_CHG_CD , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , CNBT_ETC , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR )
SELECT #dpobCd# /* 사업장코드 */ , #systemkey# /* SYSTEMKEY */ , #yrtxBlggYr# /* 귀속연도 */ , #clutSeptCd# /* 연말정산구분코드 */ , ( SELECT NVL( MAX(CNBT_SEIL_NUM)+1 ,1) FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# ) /* 기부금일련번호 */ , #conbCd# /* 기부유형코드 */ , #conbChgCd# /* 기부유형전환코드 */ , #yrsMateClCd# /* 기부국세자료구분코드 */ , #dntcntn# /* 기부내용 */ , #coplNm# /* 기부처_상호명 */ , #bsnoEncCntn# /* 기부처_사업자등록번호 */ , #cnbtRltClCd# /* 기부자관계코드 */ , #cnbtRltChgCd# /* 기부자관계전환코드 */ , PS0100.HAN_NM /* 기부자성명 */ , PS0100.RESN_REGN_NUM /* 기부자_주민등록번호 */ , #dntScnt# /* 기부명세건수 */ , NVL( ( SELECT SUM(TA01.PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM ( SELECT AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.PAY_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , SUM(AA.PYMT_DDUC_SUM)AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM
FROM PAYR0302 AA WHERE AA.PAY_ITEM_CD = #payItemCd# AND SUBSTR(AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH, 0, 4) = #yrtxBlggYr# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PYYT0302 WHERE PYYT_ITEM_CD = AA.PAY_ITEM_CD AND PYYT_YR_MNTH= AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND PAY_CD = AA.PAY_CD ) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
GROUP BY PYMT_YR_MNTH, PAY_CD, SYSTEMKEY
UNION ALL
SELECT AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH , AA.PAY_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , SUM(AA.PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM)AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM
FROM PYYT0302 AA
WHERE AA.PYYT_ITEM_CD = #payItemCd# AND SUBSTR(AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH, 0, 4) = #yrtxBlggYr# AND ( NOT EXISTS ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PAYR0302 WHERE PAY_ITEM_CD = AA.PYYT_ITEM_CD AND PYMT_YR_MNTH= AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND PAY_CD = AA.PAY_CD ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PAYR0302 WHERE PAY_ITEM_CD = AA.PYYT_ITEM_CD AND PYMT_YR_MNTH= AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND PAY_CD = AA.PAY_CD ) ) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY PYYT_YR_MNTH, PAY_CD, SYSTEMKEY )TA01 WHERE TA01.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY TA01.SYSTEMKEY ), 0)AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM /* 기부명세합계금액 */
, NVL( ( SELECT SUM(TA01.PYMT_DDUC_SUM) FROM ( SELECT AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH , AA.PAY_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , SUM(AA.PYMT_DDUC_SUM)AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM
FROM PAYR0302 AA WHERE AA.PAY_ITEM_CD = 'D9500400' AND SUBSTR(AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH, 0, 4) = #yrtxBlggYr# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PYYT0302 WHERE PYYT_ITEM_CD = AA.PAY_ITEM_CD AND PYYT_YR_MNTH= AA.PYMT_YR_MNTH AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND PAY_CD = AA.PAY_CD ) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
GROUP BY PYMT_YR_MNTH, PAY_CD, SYSTEMKEY
UNION ALL
SELECT AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH , AA.PAY_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , SUM(AA.PYYT_PYMT_DDUC_SUM)AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM
FROM PYYT0302 AA
WHERE AA.PYYT_ITEM_CD = 'D9500400' AND SUBSTR(AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH, 0, 4) = #yrtxBlggYr# AND ( NOT EXISTS ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PAYR0302 WHERE PAY_ITEM_CD = AA.PYYT_ITEM_CD AND PYMT_YR_MNTH= AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND PAY_CD = AA.PAY_CD ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PAYR0302 WHERE PAY_ITEM_CD = AA.PYYT_ITEM_CD AND PYMT_YR_MNTH= AA.PYYT_YR_MNTH AND SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND PAY_CD = AA.PAY_CD ) ) AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY PYYT_YR_MNTH, PAY_CD, SYSTEMKEY )TA01 WHERE TA01.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# GROUP BY TA01.SYSTEMKEY ), 0)AS PYMT_DDUC_SUM /* 공제대상기부금액 */ , '0' /* 기부장려금신청금 */ , '0' /* 기부금기타 */ , #kybdr# /* 입력자 */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') /* 입력일자 */ , #inptAddr# /* 입력주소 */ , #ismt# /* 수정자 */ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') /* 수정일자 */ , #revnAddr# /* 수정주소 */
FROM PSNL0100 PS0100 WHERE PS0100.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND PS0100.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165010 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND YRS_MATE_CL_CD = 'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM PDF_L102Y BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE165010 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,CNBT_SEIL_NUM /* 기부금일련번호 */ ,CONB_CD /* 기부유형코드 */ ,CONB_CHG_CD /* 기부유형전환코드 */ ,YRS_MATE_CL_CD /* 기부국세자료구분코드 */ ,DNTCNTN /* 기부내용 */ ,COPL_NM /* 기부처_상호명 */ ,BSNO_ENC_CNTN /* 기부처_사업자등록번호 */ ,CNBT_RLT_CL_CD /* 기부자관계코드 */ ,CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD /* 기부자관계전환코드 */ ,CNBT_FNM /* 기부자성명 */ ,RESNO_ENC_CNTN /* 기부자_주민등록번호 */ ,DNT_SCNT /* 기부명세건수 */ ,USE_SUM_AMT /* 기부명세합계금액 */ ,DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT /* 공제대상기부금액 */ ,CONB_SUM_AMT /* 기부장려금신청금 */ ,CNBT_ETC /* 기부금기타 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) (SELECT AC02.DPOB_CD , AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR , AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD , AC02.SYSTEMKEY , ( ( ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AC02.DPOB_CD ASC, AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR ASC, AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD ASC, AC02.SYSTEMKEY ASC)) + (SELECT (NVL(MAX(CNBT_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1) AS CNBT_SEIL_NUM FROM YE165010 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) ) AS ROWCNT , AC03.CONB_CD , AC03.DONATION_CD ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ ,'' , AC03.TRADE_NM , AC03.BUSNID , (CASE WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190001') THEN 'Y0180001' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190002','A0190007') THEN 'Y0180002' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190003','A0190004','A0190009','A0190010','A0190017','A0190018','A0190019' ,'A0190053','A0190054','A0190055','A0190056','A0190051','A0190050','A0190078','A0190079') THEN 'Y0180004' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190011','A0190012','A0190013','A0190021','A0190023') THEN 'Y0180006' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190005','A0190040' ,'A0190099','A0190076') THEN 'Y0180003' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190020' ,'A0190022' ,'A0190025','A0190033','A0190035' ,'A0190051','A0190052' ,'A0190032','A0190038') THEN 'Y0180005' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190109','A01900ZZ','A01900A7','A0190032') THEN 'Y0180006' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190100') THEN 'Y0180006' ELSE 'Y0180006' END) , (CASE WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190001') THEN '1' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190002','A0190007') THEN '2' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190003','A0190004','A0190009','A0190010','A0190017','A0190018','A0190019' ,'A0190053','A0190054','A0190055','A0190056','A0190051','A0190050','A0190078','A0190079') THEN '4' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190011','A0190012','A0190013','A0190021','A0190023') THEN '6' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190005','A0190040' ,'A0190099','A0190076') THEN '3' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190020' ,'A0190022' ,'A0190025','A0190033','A0190035' ,'A0190051','A0190052' ,'A0190032','A0190038') THEN '5' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190109','A01900ZZ','A01900A7','A0190032') THEN '6' WHEN AC02.FAMY_RELA_DIV_CD IN ('A0190100') THEN '6' ELSE '6' END) , AC03.NAME , AC03.RESID , DECODE(AC03.DNT_SCNT, 0, 1, AC03.DNT_SCNT)AS DNT_SCNT , AC03.CONB_SUM , AC03.CONB_AMT_SUM , AC03.SBDY_APLN_SUM , 0 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 AC02, ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속년도 */ ,AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,AA.SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,AA.CONB_SEIL_NUM /* 기부금명세일련번호 */ ,AA.FORM_CD /* 서식코드 */ ,AA.RESID /* 기부금_주민등록번호 */ ,AA.NAME /* 기부금_성명 */ ,AA.DAT_CD /* 자료코드 */ ,AA.BUSNID /* 기부금_사업자등록번호 */ ,AA.TRADE_NM /* 기부금_단체명 */ ,AA.DONATION_CD ,(CASE WHEN AA.DONATION_CD = '10' THEN 'B0230010' WHEN AA.DONATION_CD = '20' THEN 'B0230020' WHEN AA.DONATION_CD = '40' THEN 'B0230040' WHEN AA.DONATION_CD = '41' THEN 'B0230041' WHEN AA.DONATION_CD = '42' THEN 'B0230042' ELSE 'B0230050' END) AS CONB_CD /* 기부금_기부유형코드 */ ,AA.CONB_AMT_SUM /* 기부금_공제대상기부금액 */ ,AA.SBDY_APLN_SUM /* 기부금_기부장려금신청금액 */ ,AA.CONB_SUM /* 기부금_기부금액합계 */ ,(SELECT COUNT(CONB_DD) FROM PDF_L102D DD WHERE DD.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND DD.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND DD.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND DD.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND DD.CONB_SEIL_NUM = AA.CONB_SEIL_NUM ) AS DNT_SCNT FROM PDF_L102Y AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AA.DAT_CD = 'G0020' AND AA.PDF_DAT_APP_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM YE161030 AC01 WHERE AC01.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND AC01.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC01.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY ) ) AC03 WHERE AC02.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND AC02.DPOB_CD = AC03.DPOB_CD AND AC02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = AC03.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AC02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = AC03.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AC02.SYSTEMKEY = AC03.SYSTEMKEY AND AC02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AC03.RESID )

INSERT INTO YE165010 ( DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ ,CNBT_SEIL_NUM /* 기부금일련번호 */ ,CONB_CD /* 기부유형코드 */ ,CONB_CHG_CD /* 기부유형전환코드 */ ,YRS_MATE_CL_CD /* 기부국세자료구분코드 */ ,DNTCNTN /* 기부내용 */ ,COPL_NM /* 기부처_상호명 */ ,BSNO_ENC_CNTN /* 기부처_사업자등록번호 */ ,CNBT_RLT_CL_CD /* 기부자관계코드 */ ,CNBT_RLT_CHG_CD /* 기부자관계전환코드 */ ,CNBT_FNM /* 기부자성명 */ ,RESNO_ENC_CNTN /* 기부자_주민등록번호 */ ,DNT_SCNT /* 기부명세건수 */ ,USE_SUM_AMT /* 기부명세합계금액 */ ,DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT /* 공제대상기부금액 */ ,CONB_SUM_AMT /* 기부장려금신청금 */ ,CNBT_ETC /* 기부금기타 */ ,KYBDR /* 입력자 */ ,INPT_DT /* 입력일자 */ ,INPT_ADDR /* 입력주소 */ ,ISMT /* 수정자 */ ,REVN_DT /* 수정일자 */ ,REVN_ADDR /* 수정주소 */ ) (SELECT DPOB_CD /* 사업장코드 */ ,YRTX_BLGG_YR /* 귀속연도 */ ,CLUT_SEPT_CD /* 연말정산구분코드 */ ,SYSTEMKEY /* SYSTEMKEY */ , ( ( ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DPOB_CD ASC, YRTX_BLGG_YR ASC, CLUT_SEPT_CD ASC, SYSTEMKEY ASC)) + (SELECT (NVL(MAX(CNBT_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1) AS CNBT_SEIL_NUM FROM YE165010 AA WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#) ) /* 기부금일련번호 */ ,(CASE WHEN CONB_NM = '10' THEN 'B0230010' WHEN CONB_NM = '20' THEN 'B0230020' WHEN CONB_NM = '40' THEN 'B0230040' WHEN CONB_NM= '41' THEN 'B0230041' WHEN CONB_NM = '42' THEN 'B0230042' ELSE 'B0230050' END) /* 기부유형 */ ,CONB_NM /* 기부코드 */ ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ ,DNT_CNTN /* 기부내용 */ ,COPL_NM /* 기부처_상호명 */ ,BSNO_ENC_CNTN /* 기부처_사업자등록번호 */ , ( SELECT COMM_CD FROM BASS0300 AN02 WHERE AN02.DPOB_CD = YE167420.DPOB_CD AND AN02.MANGE_ITEM11 = YE167420.CNBT_RLT_CL_CD AND AN02.RPSTTV_CD = 'Y018' ) /* 기부자관계코드 */ , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD /* 기부자관계전환코드 */ ,CNBT_FNM /* 기부자성명 */ ,RESNO_ENC_CNTN /* 기부자_주민등록번호 */ ,DNT_SCNT /* 기부명세건수 */ ,USE_SUM_AMT /* 기부명세합계금액 */ ,DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT /* 공제대상기부금액 */ ,CONB_SUM_AMT /* 기부장려금신청금 */ ,DDC_EXCL_CONB_ETC_AMT /* 공제제외기부금기타금액 */ , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167420 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )

INSERT INTO YE165010 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #cnbtSeilNum# , #conbCd# , #conbNm# , #yrsMateClCd# , #dntcntn# , #coplNm# , #bsnoEncCntn# , #cnbtRltClCd# , #cnbtFnm# , #resnoEncCntn# , #dntScnt# , #useSumAmt# , #ddcTrgtConbAmt# , #conbSumAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE165010 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum# , CONB_CD=#conbCd# , CONB_NM=#conbNm# , YRS_MATE_CL_CD=#yrsMateClCd# , DNTCNTN=#dntcntn# , COPL_NM=#coplNm# , BSNO_ENC_CNTN=#bsnoEncCntn# , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD=#cnbtRltClCd# , CNBT_FNM=#cnbtFnm# , RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#resnoEncCntn# , DNT_SCNT=#dntScnt# , USE_SUM_AMT=#useSumAmt# , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT=#ddcTrgtConbAmt# , CONB_SUM_AMT=#conbSumAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165010 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CNBT_SEIL_NUM=#cnbtSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CNBT_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CD , CONB_NM , YRS_MATE_CL_CD , DNTCNTN , COPL_NM , BSNO_ENC_CNTN , CNBT_RLT_CL_CD , CNBT_FNM , RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DNT_SCNT , USE_SUM_AMT , DDC_TRGT_CONB_AMT , CONB_SUM_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CNBT_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE165010 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
